### Medium Resolution 

```{r pipeline, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(DiagrammeR)

DiagrammeR::grViz("digraph {
  graph [layout = dot, rankdir = TB]
  
  node [shape = rectangle]        
  rec1 [label = 'Web Scraping']
  rec2 [label = 'Data Manipulation']
  rec3 [label =  'Data Analysis']
  rec4 [label = 'Epidemics on Static Ego Graph']
  
  # edge definitions with the node IDs
  rec1 -> rec2 -> rec3 -> rec4
  }", 
  height = 100)
```
